title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.13 - Modification of procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.13 - Modification of procedures

State Regulations

The commissioner may, upon written request of a police
agency, in his discretion, by written authorization modify any of the
procedures established in sections 91.10 through
91.12
of this Part for that
particular police agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
91.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
